## Entity.isEnvironmental property

Whether the entity is environmental.

**Signature:**

```typescript
get isEnvironmental(): boolean;
```

## Remarks

Environmental entities are excluded from per-tick controller updates and update emission.

\*\*Category:\*\* Entities
